Package com.osoc6.OSOC6.winterhold

Class MerlinSpELWizard

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.winterhold.MerlinSpELWizard
public final class MerlinSpELWizard extends Object
Merlin is a SpELL (Spring Expression Language) Wizard. He will help us write concise and manageable Spring expressions. Variables starting with 'Q_' are meant to be used in Query annotations of spring.
